Platform Identifier
===================

The `PlatformIdentifier <#crawler.web_crawler.PlatformIdentifier.PlatformIdentifier.get_correct_parser>`_ class is designed to identify the platform or framework used by a website based on its HTML content. By analyzing specific script tags within the HTML, it determines the appropriate parser for extracting further details from the website.

.. automodule:: crawler.web_crawler.PlatformIdentifier
